remarks: The set of limit points of a filter.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 4-Sep-2009.)  (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 6-Aug-2015.)
statement:
flimval.1 $e |- X = U. J $.
flimval $p |- ( ( J e. Top /\ F e. U. ran Fil ) -> ( J fLim F ) = { x e. X | ( ( ( nei ` J ) ` { x } ) C_ F /\ F C_ ~P X ) } ) $.
$d F x $.
$d J x $.
$d X x $.
